Sql always encrypted properties.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ApplicationIntent As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The application workload type when connecting to a server, used by recommended version. Possible values are ReadOnly and ReadWrite. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property AuthenticationType As Nullable(Of SqlServerAuthenticationType)

Docs.summary: The type used for authentication. Type: string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property CommandTimeout As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The default wait time (in seconds) before terminating the attempt to execute a command and generating an error, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ConnectionString As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The connection string. Type: string, SecureString or AzureKeyVaultSecretReference.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ConnectRetryCount As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The number of re-connections attempted after identifying that there was an idle connection failure, used by recommended version. This must be an integer between 0 and 255. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ConnectRetryInterval As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The amount of time (in seconds) between each re-connection attempt after identifying that there was an idle connection failure, used by recommended version. This must be an integer between 1 and 60. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property ConnectTimeout As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The length of time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to the server before terminating the attempt and generating an error, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Database As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The name of the database, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Encrypt As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: Indicate whether TLS encryption is required for all data sent between the client and server, used by recommended version. Possible values are true/yes/mandatory, false/no/optional and strict. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: member this.EncryptedCredential : string with get, set

Docs.summary: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property FailoverPartner As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The name or address of the partner server to connect to if the primary server is down, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property HostNameInCertificate As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The host name to use when validating the server certificate for the connection. When not specified, the server name from the Data Source is used for certificate validation, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property IntegratedSecurity As DataFactoryElement(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: Indicate whether User ID and Password are specified in the connection (when false) or whether the current Windows account credentials are used for authentication (when true), used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property LoadBalanceTimeout As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The minimum time, in seconds, for the connection to live in the connection pool before being destroyed, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MaxPoolSize As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The maximum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MinPoolSize As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The minimum number of connections allowed in the connection pool for this specific connection string, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MultipleActiveResultSets As DataFactoryElement(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: When true, an application can maintain multiple active result sets (MARS). When false, an application must process or cancel all result sets from one batch before it can execute any other batch on that connection, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property MultiSubnetFailover As DataFactoryElement(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: If your application is connecting to an AlwaysOn availability group (AG) on different subnets, setting MultiSubnetFailover=true provides faster detection of and connection to the (currently) active server, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property PacketSize As DataFactoryElement(Of Integer)

Docs.summary: The size in bytes of the network packets used to communicate with an instance of server, used by recommended version. Type: integer (or Expression with resultType integer).
The on-premises Windows authentication password.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Pooling As DataFactoryElement(Of Boolean)

Docs.summary: Indicate whether the connection will be pooled or explicitly opened every time that the connection is requested, used by recommended version. Type: Boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Property Server As DataFactoryElement(Of String)

Docs.summary: The name or network address of the instance of SQL Server to which to connect, used by recommended version. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
